long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Birthday Greeter
-------------------------

Automatically post on friends' birthdays to...
* reconnect with
* generate leads of
* make passive sales from
... forgotten contacts.

Part of the Automation Marketing Software Suite.
